com.republicate.modality.sql

Class Pooled

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.republicate.modality.sql.Pooled
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PooledStatement

    public abstract class Pooled
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This abstract class represents a pooled object with a potential encapsulated resultset.
    Author:
    Claude Brisson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
